data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ball goes out of play for a Goteborg goal kick.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Goteborg in their own half.
Can Kalmar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goteborg's half?
Svante Ingelsson (Kalmar) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kalmar.
Glenn Nyberg signals a throw-in for Kalmar, close to Goteborg's area.
Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, In Kalmar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goteborg needs to be cautious. Kalmar have an attacking throw-in.
Goteborg to take a throw-in in Kalmar territory.
In the minute 10, Christian Kouakou hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Kalmar for Goteborg.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
Kalmar will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Goteborg.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Kalmar Kalmar drive forward through Sebastian Ring. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Kalmar.
In the minute 14, Goal! Kalmar take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Erik Israelsson.
Sebastian Ring instrumental with a fine assist.
Glenn Nyberg signals a Kalmar throw-in in Goteborg's half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in high up the field for Kalmar in Kalmar.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goteborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Kalmar's Svante Ingelsson breaks free at Guldfageln Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Glenn Nyberg awards Goteborg a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kalmar in the half of Goteborg.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Goteborg.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Important block from the Kalmar defence as Alexander Jallow fires in a strike for Goteborg.
In the minute 21, Goteborg have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Goteborg in the half of Kalmar.
Free kick Kalmar.
In the minute 24, Kalmar push forward at Guldfageln Arena and Isak Jansson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goteborg defence.
Throw-in for Kalmar close to the penalty box.
Can Kalmar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goteborg's half?
In the minute 26, Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Kalmar's Svante Ingelsson attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Goteborg at Guldfageln Arena.
In the minute 26, Glenn Nyberg signals a throw-in for Goteborg, close to Kalmar's area.
Kalmar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 29, Glenn Nyberg awards the home team a throw-in.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kalmar drive upfield and Isak Magnusson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goteborg defender.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Kalmar.
Kalmar have a dangerous throw-in.
Tobias Sana gets an equalizer for Goteborg. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 32, Great play from Christian Kouakou to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Goteborg at Guldfageln Arena.
Kalmar's Isak Jansson misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Goteborg goal kick.
Kalmar to take a throw-in in Goteborg territory.
Throw-in for Kalmar close to the penalty box.
In the minute 38, Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Kalmar's Isak Jansson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Goteborg defender.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jakob Johansson.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Kalmar in their own half.
Tobias Sana (Goteborg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
In the minute 41, Jakob Johansson is back on his feet again.
Goteborg needs to be cautious. Kalmar have an attacking throw-in.
Isak Magnusson (Kalmar) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Kalmar.
Corner awarded to Kalmar.
Can Kalmar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goteborg's half?
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Goteborg in the half of Kalmar.
Kalmar have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Christian Kouakou's header is off-target for Goteborg.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kalmar.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Glenn Nyberg signals a Goteborg throw-in in Kalmar's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Goteborg in Kalmar.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
Ball safe as Goteborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
In the minute 49, Tobias Sana (Goteborg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Goteborg.
Goteborg are pushing forward but Jakob Johansson's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 50, Kalmar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Erik Israelsson is booked for the home team.
Glenn Nyberg awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Glenn Nyberg awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 52, Goteborg push upfield but Glenn Nyberg quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in Goteborg.
Alhassan Yusuf for Goteborg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kalmar.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Kalmar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
Free kick Kalmar.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Goteborg in their own half.
Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Corner awarded to Goteborg.
In the minute 61, Christian Kouakou gets his shot on target but fails to score for Goteborg.
Throw-in for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Throw-in for Kalmar in the half of Goteborg.
In the minute 63, Edvin Crona is replacing Isak Magnusson for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
Glenn Nyberg signals a Goteborg throw-in in Kalmar's half.
In the minute 68, Goteborg to take a throw-in in Kalmar territory.
Goteborg have a goal kick.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 70, Goteborg are coming forward and Patrik Karlsson Lagemyr gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Glenn Nyberg awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Kalmar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 73, Goteborg's Patrik Karlsson Lagemyr gets in a shot on goal at Guldfageln Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Kalmar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goteborg's half?
Sargon Abraham is on a sub for Patrik Karlsson Lagemyr for Goteborg.
In the minute 74, Poya Asbaghi is making the team's second substitution at Guldfageln Arena with Kristopher Da Graca replacing Andre Calisir.
Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Glenn Nyberg awards Kalmar a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Nanne Bergstrand (Kalmar) is making a third substitution, with York Raphael replacing Svante Ingelsson.
The home team have replaced Isak Jansson with Filip Sachpekidis. This is the second substitution made today by Nanne Bergstrand.
York Raphael of Kalmar gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Goteborg at Guldfageln Arena.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Goteborg.
Can Kalmar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goteborg's half?
In the minute 80, Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kalmar.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
August Erlingmark (Goteborg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Goteborg.
At Guldfageln Arena, Kalmar are penalized for being offside.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Goteborg have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Goteborg.
In Kalmar Kalmar attack through Sebastian Ring. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Goteborg goal kick.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
Glenn Nyberg awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Glenn Nyberg will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Glenn Nyberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Goteborg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kalmar's half?
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Fidan Aliti (Kalmar) has received a first yellow card.
